IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.change_guild_member_grade') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.change_guild_member_grade GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.change_guild_member_grade @character_id dbo.id_t, @grade TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Guild_Members SET grade = @grade WHERE @character_id = grade
SET NOCOUNT OFF
